description: ff. 58. 178 x 125; 120 x 78 mm. 17 lin. 737 H. On last fol. autograph ijāzah by the author for the copyist Muḥibb al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-Khiḍr ibn ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad al-Yamanī, same date. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 86 (4: no. 1); S II, 78. Ms. Topkapı Sarayı Müzesi Kütüphanesi Arapc̦a yazmalar kataloğu, 6028 has title al-Mukhtaṣar al-ṣaghīr fī sīrat al-bashīr al-nadhīr. Incip. : ... الحمد لله حمدا ىوافى جزىل نعمائه ... اما بعد فهذا مختصر
author: Ibn Jamāʻah, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad, 1294-1366
creator: Ibn Jamāʻah, ʻAbd al-ʻAzīz ibn Muḥammad, 1294-1366
subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, d. 632—Biography—Early works to 1800
